title: Unify Progress Comparison Option banner with its card container (remove top gap)

requirements.text: Update the Progress Comparison (PhotoComparisonView) side-by-side slot UI so there is no awkward visual gap above the Option boxes: the “Option {1|2|3}” banner must be part of the same underlying larger card container and start at the very top edge where the card’s rounded corners are, forming a single continuous box.

quotes: just above the "Option" boxeson the Progress Comparison page, is an awkward space where the onderlaying box ends, change it so that the Option banner will be part of the same underlaying bigger box so that it starts from the top of it (where the edges currently are rounded)

acceptanceCriteria: In the Progress Comparison modal side-by-side view, each slot’s Option banner visually touches the top edge of its card (no empty band/gap above the banner).
The card’s top-left/top-right rounded corners are visually applied to the unified header/banner area (the banner appears integrated into the same rounded container).
No layout regressions to the slot header content (date line, Today-relative variance badge, Change button) and the image area below.
The change applies consistently to Option 1, Option 2, and Option 3.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only UI component sources must be composed, not edited).
Backend canister logic and data schemas must remain unchanged (UI-only fix).
nonGoals: Do not change comparison logic, default dates, or calendar selection behavior.
Do not redesign the Progress Comparison modal beyond removing the specific visual gap and unifying the banner with the card container.
